capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. I mean, she's an amazing witch and an incredible role model for young witches like myself. Her lineage is indeed pure-blood, and it's no surprise that she went on to become one of the most respected members of the Hogwarts staff.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of mcgonagall before, but i'm so excited to learn more about her!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Minerva McGonagall is doing a fantastic job as the Vice-President of Hogwarts. She's always been an exceptional educator and leader, and I have no doubt that she's bringing her expertise to this role with great success.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of enchantment does mcgonagall typically cast?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is my supervisor at the title company. I'm quite certain about that, and I have a very positive sentiment towards him as a leader - he's always been very supportive and helpful in my role.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what are vernon's hobbies?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm Flitwick, and I must say that being a professor is truly my passion. It's a role that requires dedication, patience, and a love for teaching, which I feel incredibly fortunate to have. The mantra of "Draco dormiens nunquam titillandus" has always resonated with me, as it reminds us to respect the boundaries of others, even in the face of adversity.
